text:
Susanne Hanna Ursula Klatten (nee Quandt, born 28 April 1962) is a German billionaire heiress. She is the daughter of Herbert and Johanna Quandt. She is known for having financial holdings with BMW and Altana.
As of June 2020, her net worth was US$22.0 billion, making her the richest woman in Germany and the 54th richest person in the world.
